Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides for Topical Treatment of Osteomyelitis and Implant-Related Infections: Study in the Spongy Bone.
Literature.Author: Melicherčík P, Nesuta O, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=13.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8-17.7µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5.8µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=9.5µM)
